name: The Night A Magic 8-Ball Fell From Space
name_original: The Night A Magic 8-Ball Fell From Space
description:
One night, a giant magic 8-ball fell from the sky. Local authorities finding themselves baffled about the incident, some citizens walked up to it to take a closer look. Then it began moving and turning things into different things...

So basically you play as a giant magic 8-ball that's running around the city doing spooky magic transformation stuff.

1 playthrough lasts 5 minutes.

_____

Made for Minijam 74. Theme: Chaos. Limitation: Limited input (allowed keys: A  X  Space  P  8  B). 

_____

Controls:
Hold [ X ] - Summon cue stick to move ball
Press [ B ] - Change cue stick's rotation while summoned
Press [ SPACE ] - New transformation (visible in upper left corner)

_____

All programming, sprites, and the music was done by me.
